attributes.action: Make Jousting an olympic sport  for the 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people want jousting to be an olympic sport or at least have it as an exhibition demonstration sport at the 2012 olympics to give it more worldwide popularity.
(check out the facebook group "make jousting an olympic sport for 2012")

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
